p: Different types of PL precursors were regulated. PA, the direct precursor of all PLs [ 24, 31], was upregulated at 1 dpi in midgut, similar to aminoPLs. Two diacylglycerols (DAG), intermediates for PE and PC productions, were up and downregulated in mosquitoes at 7 and 14 dpi, respectively. Fatty acyls can be incorporated into a glycerol head to produce PL and were regulated. Fatty acyls with an ethanolamine group can be related to PE either via degradation or as a precursor. Similar to aminoPLs, two acyl-ethanolamine increased at 1 dpi and decreased at 14 dpi in mosquitoes. In accordance with previous studies [ 34], one sphingomyelin was regulated in mosquitoes and one cholesterol compound was depleted in midgut.
